original_title: Sea Series #5-Georgian Bay: A Survey of Littoral Recreation
overview: In-camera experimentation as the sun set in a beautiful part of the world with loved ones close at hand. In this idyllic space, I could not help but wonder about the sustainability of the experience... clean air & fresh water... loving children... film stock for my camera. In this light it became a multi-dimentional anthropology.
title: Sea Series #5-Georgian Bay: A Survey of Littoral Recreation
